original_text: In the morning, Pharaoh had trouble in his mind. So he told all the magicians and the wise men in Egypt to come to him. Pharaoh told them about his dreams. But no one could tell Pharaoh what his dreams meant.
korean_text: 아침에 그의 마음이 번민하여 사람을 보내어 애굽의 점술가와 현인들을 모두 불러 그들에게 그의 꿈을 말하였으나 그것을 바로에게 해석하는 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh had trouble in his mind.
So he told all the magicians
and the wise men in Egypt
Pharaoh told them about his dreams.
sentences.korean_translation: 바로가 그들에게 자신의 꿈에 대해 말했다.

sentences.original_text: But no one could tell Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아무도 바로에게 말할 수 없었다
